branding.name: WalleGPT
branding.greeting: Hey! I'm Wally. Ask me anything about my work, background, or what I'm building.

suggestionChips.text: What should I know about your latest project?
How did you transition from UX?
Tell me about your design process
What are you working on now?

experienceSuggestionChips.text: What were your key achievements in this role?
What technologies did you work with?
What skills did you develop here?
What impact did you have on the company?
Why did you move on from this role?

mockResponses.latest-project: My latest build is Neon Atlas, a collaborative AI storyboard tool for boutique studios. I led the product vision, shaped the sonic brand, and prototyped a gesture-heavy interface that keeps teams in flow. The best part is watching clients remix prompts live and still stay aligned.
mockResponses.career-shift: I moved from UX into hybrid design-engineering because shipping ideas is the fastest way to learn. Trading static decks for living prototypes let me blend research instincts with a love for expressive interfaces. Now I still obsess over human moments, but I ship them with code.
mockResponses.design-process: Every project starts with listening tours and scrapbooks of inspiration from outside the obvious category. I prototype embarrassingly early, then invite stakeholders into weekly remix sessions so we co-own the risks. The loop ends with motion studies and a narrative that explains not just what we built, but how it feels.
mockResponses.current-work: Right now I'm exploring adaptive onboarding flows for a privacy-first fintech startup. I'm threading Gen Z pop energy into a serious product without losing trust signals. It means lots of accessibility testing, microcopy jams, and wild gradients restrained just enough.
mockResponses.experience-achievements: During my time as {title} at {company}, I chased outcomes that mattered. One highlight was {achievement}. It reinforced how {skill} and {technologies} came together to drive results across the team.
mockResponses.experience-technologies: In that role I lived inside a toolkit that spanned {technologies}. Those choices let us move fast while staying reliable, and I experimented with pairing them alongside {skill} workflows to keep the team future-ready.
mockResponses.experience-skills: That chapter sharpened my {skills}, especially while leading initiatives like {achievement}. It was a playground for blending craft with leadership and learning where to stretch next.
mockResponses.experience-challenges: The biggest challenge at {company} was {challenge}. I navigated it by leaning on {skills} and close collaboration with stakeholders, which turned the obstacle into a launchpad for a stronger roadmap.
mockResponses.experience-impact: Impact looked like measurable shifts‚Äîduring that period we {impact}. It was the result of pairing {skills} with deliberate experimentation across the team.
mockResponses.experience-transition: Leaving {company} was about following the thread of growth. After building {achievement} and scaling {skills}, I was ready to tackle problems where I could apply that momentum in new domains.
mockResponses.experience-default: That role at {company} as {title} ran from {period}. It was a pivotal season where I balanced {skills} with hands-on experimentation to keep the team shipping meaningful work.
mockResponses.default: That's a fun angle. Let me riff for a moment and share how I'm approaching that in my current experiments‚Äîfeel free to push back or steer me elsewhere.

featuredProjects.title: Project Alpha
featuredProjects.description: A bold exploration into conversational interfaces with a neon-brutalist twist.

featuredProjects.title: Project Beta
featuredProjects.description: Expressive storytelling through interactive product strategy prototypes.

featuredProjects.description: Designing resilient systems that scale across platforms and teams.

featuredProjects.description: Playful experiments merging AI copilots with personal creative rituals.

featuredProjects.title: Project Epsilon
featuredProjects.description: Crafting ambient interfaces that adapt to user context and emotional state.

featuredProjects.title: Project Zeta
featuredProjects.description: Building bridges between human intuition and machine learning workflows.

resume.summary: AI implementation lead and UX-builder with 10+ years in account management, delivering multimillion-dollar programs. I wire LLMs into real workflows, run CLI toolchains, and ship usable prototypes fast. I combine client-facing experience with UX systems and multi-model orchestration to move projects from brief to launch.

experiences.title: Founder
experiences.description: Leading AI and LLM implementation strategies to deliver MVP-ready products with practical orchestration methods. Building portfolio of AI-powered prototypes including WeReady, ListingPal, and Sagedvice.
achievements: Drive innovation in AI and LLM implementation strategies to deliver MVP-ready products
Consult with organizations on selecting and applying optimal LLMs to existing workflows, increasing efficiency and employee output
Built and maintain portfolio of prototypes (WeReady, ListingPal, Sagedvice); currently seeking grants to scale WeReady

experiences.title: Director, Experience & Innovation
experiences.description: Led design organization growth and established enterprise-wide design systems. Promoted design thinking across teams while managing comprehensive UX initiatives for SaaS products.
achievements: Co-built Kinesso's design org from 2 to 30 in under 3 years by standardizing research and design frameworks
Launched enterprise-wide design system that unified SaaS products and accelerated go-to-market
Promoted design thinking across teams, cutting design debt with reusable components
Improved dev efficiency and boosted client satisfaction and renewals

experiences.title: Sr. UX Designer
experiences.description: Managed comprehensive UX initiatives from research and wireframing to design systems, improving client satisfaction and project ROI across multiple agency clients.
achievements: Managed comprehensive UX initiatives from research to design systems
Improved client satisfaction and project ROI across agency clients
Led wireframing and prototyping for multiple concurrent projects

experiences.title: Sr. Freelance UX Designer
experiences.description: Delivered UX design services for pharmaceutical advertising agencies, focusing on compliant digital experiences and user-centered design for healthcare brands.
achievements: Delivered UX design for pharmaceutical advertising campaigns
Ensured FDA compliance in digital healthcare experiences
Collaborated with medical and regulatory teams

experiences.title: Account Supervisor
experiences.description: Optimized key account campaigns for Jazz Pharmaceuticals' Xyrem, leveraging digital insights and leading unbranded disease awareness initiatives that boosted consumer engagement.
achievements: Optimized key account campaigns for Jazz Pharmaceuticals' Xyrem
Led unbranded disease awareness initiative that boosted consumer engagement
Leveraged digital insights to improve campaign performance

experiences.title: Sr. Account Executive
experiences.description: Supervised end-to-end production of brand commercials, coordinating FDA preclearance, network approvals, and talent management for pharmaceutical brands.
achievements: Supervised end-to-end production of three brand commercials for Linzess
Coordinated FDA preclearance and network approvals
Managed talent and production logistics

experiences.title: Account Executive
experiences.description: Led unbranded campaigns and oversaw digital platform rebranding efforts, improving brand visibility and engagement for Teva Pharmaceuticals' NUVIGIL.
achievements: Led unbranded campaigns for Teva Pharmaceuticals' NUVIGIL
Oversaw digital platform rebranding efforts
Improved brand visibility and engagement

experiences.title: Account Coordinator
experiences.description: Coordinated international KOL workshop in Dubai with Pfizer stakeholders for Prevnar 13, managing logistics and stakeholder communications.
achievements: Coordinated KOL workshop in Dubai with Pfizer stakeholders for Prevnar 13
